name: OBRJKT Rio de Janeiro #002
description: The Escadaria Selarón, also known as the Selaron Steps, were created by the Chilean artist Jorge Selarón, whose work began on them in the 1990s. It is a gigantic mosaic, consisting of 250 steps covered by tiles, located in the Lapa neighbourhood, in the city of Rio de Janeiro. Special item for #oBRjkt, a movement created to celebrate the potential of Brazilian NFTs that will take place on June 11, 12 and 13, 2021. |  www.alexandremacieira.com.br
